channel.title: BBC News - England
channel.copyright: Copyright: (C) British Broadcasting Corporation, see http://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/help/rss/4498287.stm for terms and conditions of reuse.

item.title: Lorry driver who killed couple in pile-up jailed
item.description: A married pair were returning from a caravan break to celebrate their retirement when they were killed.

item.title: Mother wins court case over Staffordshire landfill site emissions
item.description: Rebecca Currie says her son's breathing difficulties have been made worse by landfill emissions.

item.title: Vet and dogs drowned in car during extreme weather
item.description: Heike Mojay-Sinclare's family had questioned whether signage at the crossing was "fit for purpose".

item.title: Sir Clive Sinclair: Computing pioneer dies aged 81
item.description: The inventor, entrepreneur and ZX Spectrum creator died at his London home following a long illness.

item.title: Crash-accused mum who missed court arrested
item.description: Mary McCann missed a court date over charges relating to the crash in which two of her children died.

item.title: Emma Raducanu reunited with her parents in Bromley
item.description: Emma Raducanu is photographed with father Ian after becoming Britain's youngest Grand Slam champion.

item.title: Hillsborough: Ex-PM backs bid for law to support disaster families
item.description: Theresa May joins calls for a special independent advocate to support families in major disasters.

item.title: Signalman jailed for Doncaster level crossing crash with Azuma train
item.description: Footage shows Michael Rochford ploughing into the side of a high-speed train at a level crossing.

item.title: Zolgensma: Marley gets 'miracle drug' for rare disorder
item.description: Marley, who is 16 months old, received the drug at a Sheffield hospital this week, his parents say.

item.title: Cyprus gang rape case: Woman appeals against conviction for lying
item.description: Her legal team says she retracted the rape allegation while under extreme pressure from police.

item.title: Dog attack victim Frankie Macritchie inquest heard in Cornwall
item.description: Frankie Macritchie, nine, was attacked by a dog at a caravan park in Cornwall, an inquest has heard.

item.title: Climate change: Lord Deben says street lights not needed in rural areas
item.description: Lord Deben says not having street lights in rural areas would help meet emissions targets.

item.title: Walleys Quarry: Mum overwhelmed at landfill court case success
item.description: The Environment Agency has been ordered to keep better control of noxious gases from Walleys Quarry.

item.title: Afghan refugee: Being caught by Taliban 'was like a scary movie'
item.description: Refugee Marwa Koofi and her family were captured at Kabul airport

item.title: Would you use a hotel for house plants?
item.description: A "hotel" catering exclusively for house plants has opened in London, as sales soared during the pandemic.

item.title: Brendon Prince: Round-Britain paddleboarder completes challenge
item.description: Sea safety campaigner Brendon Price was escorted to shore by a flotilla of paddleboards.

item.title: Drunk driver with child in car smashes into lorry in Chesterfield
item.description: Declan Webster was racing with friends before the huge crash in Chesterfield.

item.title: Cows dead after lorry carrying them overturns in Upper Broughton
item.description: The lorry was transporting 39 cows when it crashed and overturned in a Nottinghamshire village.

item.title: Two men rescued after getting stuck on Tintagel cliffs
item.description: The fishermen climbed about 20ft to escape the incoming tide on Wednesday.

item.title: Anglers banned from taking River Severn salmon catch home
item.description: Catch and release rules are being introduced by the Environment Agency to protect salmon stocks.

item.title: Pawanveer and Sanjay Singh: Six charged over fatal crash
item.description: Pawanveer Singh, aged 23 months, and 10-year-old Sanjay died at the scene of the collision.

item.title: Tamim Ian Habimana stabbing death: Mum hopes to raise awareness
item.description: Tamim Ian Habimana, 15, was attacked as he walked home from school in July.

item.title: Maddie Durdant-Hollamby: Man who killed girlfriend took his own life
item.description: Benjamin Green stabbed Maddie Durdant-Hollamby in the chest before killing himself, an inquest hears.

item.title: Leeds German Christmas market 2021 cancelled due to coronavirus
item.description: Organisers say uncertainties over restrictions led to an early decision to cancel the Leeds event.

item.title: England v New Zealand: Heather Knight stars as hosts win ODI opener in Bristol
item.description: England overcome a stuttering batting performance to beat New Zealand by 30 runs in a close first one-day international in Bristol.

item.title: Leicester City 2-2 Napoli: Group favourites level after exciting encounter
item.description: Leicester are denied victory in their Europa League opener after Napoli's Victor Osimhen scores twice in the second half.

item.title: Warrington survive fightback to end Castleford's play-off hopes
item.description: Warrington Wolves survive a fightback and the dismissal of Mike Cooper to end Castleford Tigers' play-off hopes.

item.title: Dinamo Zagreb 0-2 West Ham United: Michail Antonio and Declan Rice score in comfortable Europa League win
item.description: West Ham open their Europa League Group H campaign with a comfortable win at Dinamo Zagreb.

item.title: England v North Macedonia: 'We want to make fans proud' - Sarina Wiegman
item.description: New manager Sarina Wiegman says England want to "make the fans proud" during her first match in charge.
